channel.title: Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to 373*
channel.description:
[quote="BAsh, post:1, topic:1524"]This is my version of SlaveBot. It dosn't contain any IMPSoft code (Except the free scripts), and I have not seen the slaveBot code or even have a copy of the program on my computer.
For those of you with a conscience this is my version of SlaveBot without stealing from any of its authors.
It has a console, script, and control tab for easy gaming, thus reducing cpu power spent on the command console window, have a look at the attached image.
Windows users: Compile as usual, then click on the shortcut "Aryan2". if it dosn't work, open the properties and change the Target box so there is no path infront of the word "javaw", click okay and try again.
Linux users: I'm not sure if there is a version of javaw available, if so juct click on the Aryan2.desktop file and it should work.
Enjoy[/quote] ROLF i did only update this :D, didnt test it yet, need to go to bed :(. Please post comments etc and i dont take credit i think......

item.title: Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to 373*
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

lol
yeah update it, its fine, all the changes where in bot.java.
Actually I wasn’t trying to get u mad at me, I just wanted a free alternative - watch out though, i’m looking at slavebot master or whatever you are now calling it.
In terms of detectability/use of proxys - like geno said, all i did was cosmetic, so implement these things like in regular Aryan.

Read full topic

item.title: Slave Bot Alternative *update by mx1000/DJarn0/pelle to 373*
item.dc:creator: @GenoDemoN GenoDemoN
item.description:
@GenoDemoN wrote:

sh4d0ws:

Dude, I don’t know wtf you’re smoking but it’s CLEARLY stated in the other thread that this has no code copied from Geno/Eric’s client. Also, Eric came into the previous thread and only cared about the redistributed scripts, but he knew he couldn’t do anything about the client because it technically is not property of impsoft.

if you really want to get technical its all property of java sun cause its thier commands.
we could only get him for the scripts cause the tab thing is easily done with a tabbed java client tut. thre sint anything else on top of that, none of the traps that impsoft removes are removed in it and there isnt any sort of mouse so its not like its good or anything. its main goal was to get us mad at him.

Read full topic
